Name: Space Bomb
About the game: Play with your friends in a battle arena with up to 6 players online or offline. The battle consists of two teams (blue and red) where you use various types of bombs with different effects to face the opposing team, not to mention the challenge you will find in each arena with traps and obstacles. Choose different scenarios and characters and have fun with your friends!
